overview: A member of the New York and Pennsylvania Bars, Tanya oversees all legal and business affairs matters for Dada Entertainment. Her major responsibilities include content acquisition and licensing with record labels, music publishers and other content rights holders. Tanya has extensive experience in intellectual property , copyright, licensing and litigation. A Dada staff member since 2008, she received her J.D. at the Widener University School of Law in Wilmington, DE.
